This is just a quick post to store web resources about project structure and reproducible workflows in data science.

## Project structure

+ [Cookie Cutter Data Science](https://drivendata.github.io/cookiecutter-data-science/): A Python-based project structure
+ [ProjectTemplate](http://projecttemplate.net/index.html): The granddaddy in R
+ This [blog post](https://nicercode.github.io/blog/2013-04-05-projects/) by Rich FitzJohn
+ [Carl Boettiger's](https://www.carlboettiger.info/2012/05/06/research-workflow.html) workflow
+ [A Quick Guide to Organizing Computational Biology Projects](https://journals.plos.org/ploscompbiol/article?id=10.1371/journal.pcbi.1000424#s7)
